title: CodeType: Not for the Faint of Heart
shortDescription: Python's types.CodeType help includes the warning 'Not for the faint of heart'!
detailedDescription: When you explore Python's internals and look at help(types.CodeType), you'll find a humorous warning in the documentation: 'Create a code object. Not for the faint of heart.' This warning acknowledges that working with code objects directly is complex and potentially dangerous, as you're manipulating Python's internal bytecode representation.
